pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a red house covered in snow, with several colorful sleds leaning against the wall. The camera gradually zooms in on the sleds, which are green, yellow, red, and blue, and are positioned next to a wooden post and a lantern. As the camera continues to zoom in, a snowplow starts to appear from the right side of the frame, moving towards the house. The snowplow becomes more visible, clearing the snow in front of the house.
